data.title: Water-saving tips
data.author: Peggy Gartin
data.excerpt: California is facing significant drought across the state. So it’s time we cut back on our water consumption even more. Whether it’s inside or outside your home, small changes can save 10 to 100 gallons of water a day.  Here are the top ways to conserve water:  Improve landscape irrigation50% of residential water use goes … Read more

_genesis_description: The top 5 tips to conserve water, both inside and outside your home. Small changes can save 10 to 100 gallons of water a day.
